p: 1-(4-methylbenzyl)-2-phenylcyclopropane-1-carboxylic acid (15). Purification by flash chromatography on silica gel using methanol/dichloromethane (1:99) afforded the product as a yellow powder in 80% yield. 1H NMR (400 MHz, CDCl 3) δ 7.46 − 7.21 (m, 5H), 7.06 (d, J = 13.0 Hz, 4H), 3.20 (d, J = 15.8 Hz, 1H), 2.97 (t, J = 7.9 Hz, 1H), 2.30 (s, 3H), 1.91 (d, J = 16.4 Hz, 2H), 1.47 (s, 1H).
